### Version history

This page provides information about older or alternative versions of  indicative distribution map for this ecosystem functional group [**{{< meta params.efgname >}}**](/efg-info/SM1_2.qmd).
Check the current maps [here](/map-info/SM1_2_valid.qmd).

- Indicative Map (**code: SM1.2.IM.grid**, version v2.0) discarded 
 - Indicative Map (**code: SM1.2.IM.orig**, version v1.0) discarded 

### Datasets

Datasets considered for previous versions of the indicative map

- **Carbonate-rocks-3.0** (Williams P, Ting Fong Y  2016).

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset             |url                                                                  |
|:-------------------|:--------------------------------------------------------------------|
|Carbonate-rocks-3.0 |<https://www.fos.auckland.ac.nz/our_research/karst/>{target='links'} |


:::
:::

### Available files

You can download geospatial data for older versions of these maps from the following sources:

**SM1.2.IM.orig** (v1.0): [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958622){target="gisdata"}

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.

###  License information

Indicative maps have been released with a ![](https://zenodo.org/static/icons/licenses/cc-by-icon.svg){height=20} Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license. 

But see details of dataset licenses below:

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset |license_info |
|:-------|:------------|


:::
:::

## References

References used in these versions of the maps.

- Williams P, Ting Fong Y  (2016) **World map of carbonate rock outcrops v3.0** The University of Auckland, Auckland. [Webpage](https://www.fos.auckland.ac.nz/our_research/karst/)
